Kankoda/MediaKit

Streaming media apps in Swift and SwiftUI

View on index

Related repos

  • Chat SDK for SwiftUI apps
  • Streams movies and shows to iOS and tvOS devices
  • Engine for GIF display in iOS apps
  • Video client for Jellyfin using VLC
  • self-hosted media browser for streaming anime, series, movies
  • Downloads movies and anime from streaming sites
  • Custom iOS keyboards with Swift and SwiftUI
  • Runs iOS apps on Apple Silicon Macs
  • SDK for Airplay, Miracast, and GoogleCast protocols
